text: Nɨ asɨzir bean amebamɨn nguzitam okemegh, tuavimɨn bean amebar kam batoghtɨ, a puvɨra nɨn atarightɨ, nɨ bar kuramra inigham. Ezɨ gumazir nɨghnɨzir aghuiba puvatɨzim, arazir kurabagh amuavɨra iti, nɨ a batoghɨva, nɨ bar ikuvigham. Eghtɨ adarir arazir kam, a bean amebamɨn adarir arazim gafiragham.
